column5: Hey Guys  I was looking at Bass Pro and noticed these cheap rod and reel combos - I fish Quinte about 3x a year and I am looking for a combo with a line counter - just wondering if anyone has used these reels or rods - any info would be appreciated.  thanks Smitty

Try the US bass pro website for a better deal, I just bought the reel for Okuma stratamaster reel $39 US, if you buy for a total value of US$100 the shipping cost is just $18.  I will only troll for lake trout few times a year, therefore do not want to spend too much money.
